result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gregory R. Manthie

records.addlTxt:

INCLUDES 22CM789 & 22CF1010: No contact with victim(s): G.L.B., Any person under the age of 18 years old except as required in the Jail. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol or controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (2) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Case Called: 
INCLUDES 22CM789 & 22CF1010.

PLEA:  NOT GUILTY on Misdemeanor File.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): G.L.B., Any Person under the age of 18 Years Old expect as required in the Jail.
- No Bars/Liquor Stores/Taverns/Beer Tents.
- Absolute Sobriety and No Possession of Alcohol or Controlled Substances unless prescribed. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 2 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
